最小方差无偏估计（UMVUE）

Recall

If δ\deltaδ is unbiased est's, MSE(δ,η(θ))=Var(δ(X~))MSE(\delta, \eta(\theta))=Var(\delta(\utilde{X}))MSE(δ,η(θ))=Var(δ(X​))

如果我們限定在無偏的估計方法中找最優的，那麼就是找方差最小的估計方法。也就是 Uniformly Minimum Variance Unbiased Estimator ，最小方差無偏估計。

危險

無偏並不一定是最好的。

Definition

δ∗(X~)\delta^*(\utilde{X})δ∗(X​) is called UMVUE for η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ) iff

  1. Eθδ∗(X~)=η(θ),∀θE_\theta\delta^*(\utilde{X})=\eta(\theta), \forall\thetaEθ​δ∗(X​)=η(θ),∀θ i.e. unbiased.

  2. ∀\forall∀ unbiased est. δ(X~)\delta(\utilde{X})δ(X​) for η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ),

    Varθ(δ∗(X~))≤Varθ(δ(X~))Var_\theta(\delta^*(\utilde{X}))\le Var_\theta(\delta(\utilde{X}))Varθ​(δ∗(X​))≤Varθ​(δ(X​)) i.e. 方差最小。

Q: 充分統計量在估計上有什麼用？

Recall

  1. 隨機變量 T,WT, WT,W

    E[E(T∣W)]=E[T]Var(T)=E[Var(T∣W)]+Var[E(T∣W)]≥Var[E(T∣W)] \begin{align*} E[E(T|W)] &= E[T]\\ Var(T) &= E[Var(T|W)]+Var[E(T|W)]\\ &\ge Var[E(T|W)] \end{align*}E[E(T∣W)]Var(T)​=E[T]=E[Var(T∣W)]+Var[E(T∣W)]≥Var[E(T∣W)]​

  2. If T=T(X~)T=T(\utilde{X})T=T(X​) is suff for θ\thetaθ   ⟺  fX~∣T(x~∣t)⊥θ\iff f_{\utilde{X}|T}(\utilde{x}|t) \perp \theta⟺fX​∣T​(x​∣t)⊥θ

      ⟹  ∀δ(X~),E[δ(X~)∣T]=∫δ(x~)∗fX~∣T(x~∣t)dx~⊥θ\implies \forall \delta(\utilde{X}), E[\delta(\utilde{X})|T] = \int \delta(\utilde{x})*f_{\utilde{X}|T}(\utilde{x}|t)d\utilde{x} \perp\theta⟹∀δ(X​),E[δ(X​)∣T]=∫δ(x​)∗fX​∣T​(x​∣t)dx​⊥θ

    since both δ(x~)\delta(\utilde{x})δ(x​) and fX~∣T(x~∣t)f_{\utilde{X}|T}(\utilde{x}|t)fX​∣T​(x​∣t) are independent of θ\thetaθ.

Theorem

Rao-Blackwellized

Suppse X~∼iidf(x~;θ),θ∈Ω\utilde{X}\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} f(\utilde{x};\theta), \theta\in\OmegaX​∼iidf(x​;θ),θ∈Ω

S(X~)S(\utilde{X})S(X​) be any est. for η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ) and T=T(X~)T=T(\utilde{X})T=T(X​) is suff for θ\thetaθ, with Eθ∣S(X~)∣≤∞E_\theta|S(\utilde{X})|\le\inftyEθ​∣S(X​)∣≤∞

Let δ(T)=E[S(X~)∣T]\delta(T)=E[S(\utilde{X})|T]δ(T)=E[S(X​)∣T], then

  1. δ(T)\delta(T)δ(T) is a statistic with Eθδ(T)=Eθ(S(X~)),∀θE_\theta\delta(T)=E_\theta(S(\utilde{X})), \forall\thetaEθ​δ(T)=Eθ​(S(X​)),∀θ

  2. For any function η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ), MSE(δ(T),η(θ))≤MSE(S(X~),η(θ)),∀θMSE(\delta(T), \eta(\theta))\le MSE(S(\utilde{X}), \eta(\theta)), \forall\thetaMSE(δ(T),η(θ))≤MSE(S(X​),η(θ)),∀θ

  3. If Var(S(X~))≤∞,∀θVar(S(\utilde{X}))\le\infty, \forall\thetaVar(S(X​))≤␀␀∞,∀θ, then

    MSE(δ(T),η(θ))<MSE(S(X~),η(θ)),∀θMSE(\delta(T), \eta(\theta)) < MSE(S(\utilde{X}), \eta(\theta)), \forall\thetaMSE(δ(T),η(θ))<MSE(S(X​),η(θ)),∀θ

EX: X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidB(1,p),p∈Ω=(0,1)X_1,\cdots,X_n\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} B(1, p), p\in\Omega=(0,1)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidB(1,p),p∈Ω=(0,1), let η(p)=p\eta(p)=pη(p)=p

  ⟹  T=∑i=1nXi\implies T=\sum_{i=1}^nX_i⟹T=∑i=1n​Xi​ is suff for ppp.

隨便找一個 η(p)\eta(p)η(p) 的無偏估計 S(X~)=X1S(\utilde{X})=X_1S(X​)=X1​, then Ep(S(X~))=Ep(X1)=pE_p(S(\utilde{X}))=E_p(X_1)=pEp​(S(X​))=Ep​(X1​)=p and Varp(S(X~))=p(1−p)Var_p(S(\utilde{X}))=p(1-p)Varp​(S(X​))=p(1−p)

Let δ(T)=E[S(X~)∣T]=E[X1∣T]=Tn=Xˉ\delta(T)=E[S(\utilde{X})|T]=E[X_1|T]=\frac{T}{n}=\bar{X}δ(T)=E[S(X​)∣T]=E[X1​∣T]=nT​=Xˉ, and Var(Xˉ)=p(1−p)n<p(1−p)Var(\bar{X})=\frac{p(1-p)}{n}<p(1-p)Var(Xˉ)=np(1−p)​<p(1−p) is better.

備註

nE(X1∣T)=∑E(Xi∣T)=E(∑Xi∣T)=E(T∣T)=1nE(X_1|T)=\sum E(X_i|T)=E(\sum X_i|T)=E(T|T)=1nE(X1​∣T)=∑E(Xi​∣T)=E(∑Xi​∣T)=E(T∣T)=1

我們可以利用充分統計量，通過 Rao-Blackwellized 來改善估計方法，使得偏差不變的情況下，方差更小。

但如果我們有兩個充分統計量 T1,T2T_1, T_2T1​,T2​ ，以及任意一個對於 θ\thetaθ 的估計量 S(X~)S(\utilde{X})S(X​)

⇒BlackwellRaoδ1(T1)=E[S(X~)∣T1]δ2(T2)=E[S(X~)∣T2]\begin{align*} \xRightarrow[Blackwell]{Rao} \delta_1(T_1)&=E[S(\utilde{X})|T_1]\\ \delta_2(T_2)&=E[S(\utilde{X})|T_2] \end{align*}RaoBlackwell​δ1​(T1​)δ2​(T2​)​=E[S(X​)∣T1​]=E[S(X​)∣T2​]​

δ1(T1)\delta_1(T_1)δ1​(T1​) 和 δ2(T2)\delta_2(T_2)δ2​(T2​) 都比 S(X~)S(\utilde{X})S(X​) 好，但是我們無法比較 δ1(T1)\delta_1(T_1)δ1​(T1​) 和 δ2(T2)\delta_2(T_2)δ2​(T2​) 誰更好。

為了找到最好的充分統計量，我們需要引入完備（complete）的概念。

Definition

X~∼iidf(x~;θ),θ∈Ω⊆Rr\utilde{X}\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} f(\utilde{x};\theta), \theta\in\Omega\subseteq\R^rX​∼iidf(x​;θ),θ∈Ω⊆Rr

F={ f(;θ);θ∈Ω }\mathscr{F}=\set{f(;\theta);\theta\in\Omega}F={f(;θ);θ∈Ω} is complete   ⟺  \iff⟺

∀h\forall h∀h s.t. Eθ[h(X~)]=0  ⟹  Pθ(h(X~)=0)=1,∀θE_\theta[h(\utilde{X})]=0\implies P_\theta(h(\utilde{X})=0)=1, \forall \thetaEθ​[h(X​)]=0⟹Pθ​(h(X​)=0)=1,∀θ i.e. h(X~)=0h(\utilde{X})=0h(X​)=0 almost surely.

Now, X~∼iidf(x~;θ),θ∈Ω\utilde{X}\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} f(\utilde{x};\theta), \theta\in\OmegaX​∼iidf(x​;θ),θ∈Ω, let T=T(X~)T=T(\utilde{X})T=T(X​) with pdf fT(t;θ)f_T(t;\theta)fT​(t;θ) and FT={ fT(;θ);θ∈Ω }\mathscr{F}_T=\set{f_T(;\theta);\theta\in\Omega}FT​={fT​(;θ);θ∈Ω}

Definition

TTT is complete

  ⟺  FT\iff \mathscr{F}_T⟺FT​ is complete

  ⟺  ∀h\iff \forall h⟺∀h with Eθh(T)=0  ⟹  h(T)=0E_\theta h(T)=0 \implies h(T)=0Eθ​h(T)=0⟹h(T)=0 almost surely ∀θ\forall\theta∀θ

Theorem

Lehmann-Scheffe

Let X~∼iidf(x~;θ),θ∈Ω⊆Rr\utilde{X}\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} f(\utilde{x};\theta), \theta\in\Omega\subseteq\R^rX​∼iidf(x​;θ),θ∈Ω⊆Rr

T=T(X~)T=T(\utilde{X})T=T(X​) is suff for θ\thetaθ and is complete

EX: X∼iidB(m,p),p∈(0,1),m=1,2,⋯X\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} B(m,p), p\in(0,1), m=1,2,\cdotsX∼iidB(m,p),p∈(0,1),m=1,2,⋯

Let hhh s.t. Eph(X)=0,∀p∈(0,1)E_ph(X)=0, \forall p\in(0,1)Ep​h(X)=0,∀p∈(0,1)

  ⟺  ∑x=0mh(x)fX(x)=∑x=0mh(x)(mx)px(1−p)m−x=0\iff \sum_{x=0}^m h(x)f_X(x)=\sum_{x=0}^m h(x)\binom{m}{x}p^x(1-p)^{m-x}=0⟺∑x=0m​h(x)fX​(x)=∑x=0m​h(x)(xm​)px(1−p)m−x=0, ∀p∈(0,1)\forall p\in(0,1)∀p∈(0,1)

Since p∈(0,1)  ⟹  px(1−p)m−x≠0p\in(0,1)\implies p^x(1-p)^{m-x}\neq 0p∈(0,1)⟹px(1−p)m−x=0

  ⟺  h(x)(mx)\iff h(x)\binom{m}{x}⟺h(x)(xm​), ∀x=0,1,⋯ ,m\forall x=0,1,\cdots,m∀x=0,1,⋯,m

  ⟺  h(x)=0\iff h(x)=0⟺h(x)=0, ∀x=0,1,⋯ ,m\forall x=0,1,\cdots,m∀x=0,1,⋯,m

i.e. Pp(h(X)=0)=1P_p(h(X)=0)=1Pp​(h(X)=0)=1

  ⟹  B(m,p)\implies B(m,p)⟹B(m,p) is complete.

EX: X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidB(1,p),p∈(0,1)X_1,\cdots, X_n \stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} B(1,p), p\in(0,1)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidB(1,p),p∈(0,1)

  1. T0=T0(X~)=X~T_0=T_0(\utilde{X})=\utilde{X}T0​=T0​(X​)=X​ is suff for ppp, but not complete.

    let h(T0)=X1−X2h(T_0)=X_1-X_2h(T0​)=X1​−X2​, then Ep(h(T0))=0,∀p∈(0,1)E_p(h(T_0))=0, \forall p\in(0,1)Ep​(h(T0​))=0,∀p∈(0,1) but h(T0)≠0h(T_0)\neq 0h(T0​)=0 almost surely.

  2. T_1=X_1 is not suff for ppp, but T1=X1∼iidB(1,p)T_1=X_1\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} B(1,p)T1​=X1​∼iidB(1,p) is complete but the previous EX.

  3. T=T(X~)=∑i=1nXi∼iidB(n,p)T=T(\utilde{X})=\sum_{i=1}^n X_i \stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} B(n,p)T=T(X​)=∑i=1n​Xi​∼iidB(n,p) is suff for ppp and is complete.

Let T=T(X~)T=T(\utilde{X})T=T(X​) be suff for θ\thetaθ and u(X~)u(\utilde{X})u(X​) be any unbiased est.

By Rao-Blackwellized, δ∗(T)=E[u0(X~)∣T]\delta^*(T)=E[u_0(\utilde{X})|T]δ∗(T)=E[u0​(X​)∣T] dominates u(X~)u(\utilde{X})u(X​).

For any u(X~)u(\utilde{X})u(X​) unbiased est, and δ(T)=E[u(X~)∣T]\delta(T)=E[u(\utilde{X})|T]δ(T)=E[u(X​)∣T] is also dominates u(X~)u(\utilde{X})u(X​).

Let h(T)=δ∗(T)−δ(T)h(T)=\delta^*(T)-\delta(T)h(T)=δ∗(T)−δ(T)

Eθ(δ∗(T)−δ(T))=Eθδ∗(T)−Eθδ(T)=Eθu0(X~)−Eθu(X~)=η(θ)−η(θ)=0\begin{align*} E_\theta(\delta^*(T)-\delta(T)) &= E_\theta\delta^*(T)-E_\theta\delta(T)\\ &=E_\theta u_0(\utilde{X}) - E_\theta u(\utilde{X})\\ &=\eta(\theta)-\eta(\theta)\\ &=0 \end{align*}Eθ​(δ∗(T)−δ(T))​=Eθ​δ∗(T)−Eθ​δ(T)=Eθ​u0​(X​)−Eθ​u(X​)=η(θ)−η(θ)=0​

Since TTT is complete   ⟹  h(T)=0\implies h(T)=0⟹h(T)=0 almost surely ∀θ\forall\theta∀θ   ⟹  δ(T)=δ∗(T)\implies \delta(T)=\delta^*(T)⟹δ(T)=δ∗(T)

i.e. For any unbiased est. u(X~)u(\utilde{X})u(X​) is dmoniated by δ∗(T)\delta^*(T)δ∗(T),   ⟹  δ∗(T)\implies\delta^*(T)⟹δ∗(T) is the UMVUE for η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ).

任何無偏估計都可以用充分完備統計量來改善。改善後的結果是唯一的，並且改善得到的估計量一定比原來的更好（或一樣好）。所以我們只需要找到一個充分完備統計量，就可以得到 UMVUE。

Theorem

Lehmann-Scheffe

Let X~∼iidf(x~;θ),θ∈Ω⊂Rr\utilde{X}\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} f(\utilde{x};\theta), \theta\in\Omega\subset \R^rX​∼iidf(x​;θ),θ∈Ω⊂Rr

T=T(X~)T=T(\utilde{X})T=T(X​) is suff for θ\thetaθ and is complete

Let u(X~)u(\utilde{X})u(X​) be any unbiased est. for η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ) with finite variance

and δ(T)=E[u(X~)∣T]\delta(T)=E[u(\utilde{X})|T]δ(T)=E[u(X​)∣T], then δ(T)\delta(T)δ(T) is the unique UMVUE for η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ)

因此，如果我們有一個對於 θ\thetaθ 充分且完備的統計量，那麼我們可以有兩種方法計算 η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ) 的UMVUE：

  1. 隨便找一個無偏␀估計，然後通過 Rao-Blackwellized 計算 δ(T)=E[δ(X~)∣T]\delta(T) = E[\delta(\utilde{X})|T]δ(T)=E[δ(X​)∣T]，則 δ(T)\delta(T)δ(T) 是 UMVUE。但計算過程可能很複雜。

  2. 根據 η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ) 猜一個 TTT 的函數 g(T)g(T)g(T)，計算 E[g(T)]E[g(T)]E[g(T)]，然後根據結果調整 g(T)g(T)g(T)，直到 E[g(T)]=η(θ)E[g(T)]=\eta(\theta)E[g(T)]=η(θ)，則 g(T)g(T)g(T) 是 UMVUE。

EX: X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidB(1,p),p∈(0,1)X_1, \cdots, X_n\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} B(1,p),p\in(0,1)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidB(1,p),p∈(0,1)

  ⟹  T=∑i=1nXi\implies T=\sum_{i=1}^nX_i⟹T=∑i=1n​Xi​ is suff for ppp and is complete.

∀p,E(T)=np  ⟹  E(Tn)=p\forall p ,E(T)=np\implies E(\frac{T}{n})=p∀p,E(T)=np⟹E(nT​)=p, so Tn\frac{T}{n}nT​ is the UMVUE for ppp.

EX: X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidU(0,θ),θ>0X_1,\cdots,X_n\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} U(0,\theta), \theta>0X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidU(0,θ),θ>0

know: T=X(n)T=X_{(n)}T=X(n)​ is suff for θ\thetaθ

Q: Is X(n)X_{(n)}X(n)​ complete?

∀h\forall h∀h s.t. Eθh(X(n))=0,∀θ>0E_\theta h(X_{(n)})=0, \forall\theta>0Eθ​h(X(n)​)=0,∀θ>0

0=∫−∞∞h(t)fT(t)dt=∫−∞∞h(t)n(F(t))n−1f(t)dt=n∫0∞h(t)(tθ)n−1dt=nθn∫0∞h(t)tn−1dt  ⟺  ∫0∞h(t)tn−1dt=0,∀θ>0\begin{align*} 0&=\int_{-\infty}^\infty h(t)f_T(t) dt\\ &=\int_{-\infty}^\infty h(t)n(F(t))^{n-1}f(t) dt\\ &= n \int_{0}^\infty h(t)(\frac{t}{\theta})^{n-1} dt\\ &= \frac{n}{\theta^n}\int_{0}^\infty h(t)t^{n-1} dt\\ \iff &\int_{0}^\infty h(t)t^{n-1} dt=0, \forall\theta>0 \end{align*}0⟺​=∫−∞∞​h(t)fT​(t)dt=∫−∞∞​h(t)n(F(t))n−1f(t)dt=n∫0∞​h(t)(θt​)n−1dt=θnn​∫0∞​h(t)tn−1dt∫0∞​h(t)tn−1dt=0,∀θ>0​

假設 h(t)h(t)h(t) 是連續的，則 h(t)tn−1h(t)t^{n-1}h(t)tn−1 也是連續的，那麼 h(t)tn−1=0,∀t∈(0,∞)h(t)t^{n-1}=0, \forall t\in(0,\infty)h(t)tn−1=0,∀t∈(0,∞)

  ⟹  h(t)=0,∀t∈(0,∞)\implies h(t)=0, \forall t\in(0,\infty)⟹h(t)=0,∀t∈(0,∞)

  ⟹  X(n)\implies X_{(n)}⟹X(n)​ is complete.

Hence, X(n)X_{(n)}X(n)​ is suff for θ\thetaθ and is complete.

  1. η(θ)=θ=Eθ(X12),∀θ>0\eta(\theta)=\theta=E_\theta(\frac{X_1}{2}),\forall \theta >0η(θ)=θ=Eθ​(2X1​​),∀θ>0

    1. X12\frac{X_1}{2}2X1​​:unbaised for η\etaη   ⟹  \implies⟹ The UMVUE for θ\thetaθ is E(X12∣T)E(\frac{X_1}{2}|T)E(2X1​​∣T), 但其中的計算過程很複雜。

    2. know, fT(t)=ntn−1θn,0<t<θf_T(t)=n\frac{t^{n-1}}{\theta^n}, 0<t<\thetafT​(t)=nθntn−1​,0<t<θ

      Eθ[X(n)]=∫0θt⋅ntn−1θndt=nθn∫0θtndt=nθntn+1n+1∣0θ=nθnθn+1n+1=nn+1θ\begin{align*} E_\theta[X_{(n)}] &= \int_0^\theta t\cdot n\frac{t^{n-1}}{\theta^n} dt\\ &=\frac{n}{\theta^n}\int_0^\theta t^n dt\\ &=\frac{n}{\theta^n}\frac{t^{n+1}}{n+1}\bigg|_0^\theta\\ &=\frac{n}{\theta^n}\frac{\theta^{n+1}}{n+1}\\ &=\frac{n}{n+1}\theta \end{align*}Eθ​[X(n)​]​=∫0θ​t⋅nθntn−1​dt=θnn​∫0θ​tndt=θnn​n+1tn+1​​0θ​=θnn​n+1θn+1​=n+1n​θ​

        ⟹  E(X(n)n+1)=θ\implies E(\frac{X_{(n)}}{n+1})=\theta⟹E(n+1X(n)​​)=θ, i.e. X(n)n+1\frac{X_{(n)}}{n+1}n+1X(n)​​ is the UMVUE for θ\thetaθ.

      直觀來說，Xi,i=1,…,nX_i,i=1,\dots,nXi​,i=1,…,n 將 (0,θ)(0,\theta)(0,θ) 分成了 n+1n+1n+1 個區間。因為是均勻分佈，所有每個區間的平均長度都會是 θn+1\frac{\theta}{n+1}n+1θ​，而 X(n)X_{(n)}X(n)​ 就是從左到右第 nnn 個分隔點，所以 E(X(n))=nn+1θE(X_{(n)})=\frac{n}{n+1}\thetaE(X(n)​)=n+1n​θ。

  2. η(θ)=θ2\eta(\theta)=\theta^2η(θ)=θ2

    Try Eθ(X(n)2)=nθn∫0θtn+1dt=nn+2θ2E_\theta(X_{(n)}^2)=\frac{n}{\theta^n}\int_0^\theta t^{n+1} dt=\frac{n}{n+2}\theta^2Eθ​(X(n)2​)=θnn​∫0θ​tn+1dt=n+2n​θ2

      ⟹  E(n+2nX(n)2)=θ2\implies E(\frac{n+2}{n}X_{(n)}^2)=\theta^2⟹E(nn+2​X(n)2​)=θ2

Definition

Exp Family Let X~∼iidf(x~;θ),θ∈Ω⊆Rr\utilde{X}\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} f(\utilde{x};\theta), \theta\in\Omega\subseteq\R^rX​∼iidf(x​;θ),θ∈Ω⊆Rr Suppose that ∀x~,θ\forall \utilde{x},\theta∀x​,θ

f(x~;θ)=c(θ)exp⁡{ ∑i=1kQi(θ)Ti(x~) }h(x~)f(\utilde{x};\theta)=c(\theta)\exp\set{\sum_{i=1}^k Q_i(\theta)T_i(\utilde{x})}h(\utilde{x})f(x​;θ)=c(θ)exp{i=1∑k​Qi​(θ)Ti​(x​)}h(x​)

and

X={ x~:f(x~;θ)>0 }⊥θ,c(θ)>0,h(x~)>0X=\set{\utilde{x}:f(\utilde{x};\theta)>0}\perp\theta, c(\theta)>0, h(\utilde{x})>0X={x​:f(x​;θ)>0}⊥θ,c(θ)>0,h(x​)>0

then f(x~;θ∈)f(\utilde{x};\theta\in)f(x​;θ∈) k-parameter exp family.

指數部分需要有 K 個部分組成，那麼 f(x~;θ)f(\utilde{x};\theta)f(x​;θ) 就是一個 K-parameter exp family。

Theorem

Let X~∼iidf(x~;θ),θ∈Ω⊆Rr\utilde{X}\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} f(\utilde{x};\theta), \theta\in\Omega\subseteq\R^rX​∼iidf(x​;θ),θ∈Ω⊆Rr and f(x~;θ)∈f(\utilde{x};\theta)\inf(x​;θ)∈ k-parameter exp family with

Cramer-Rao Lower Bound​

∀u(X~)\forall u(\utilde{X})∀u(X​) is unbiased for η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ), 如果我們有一個下界 LB(θ)LB(\theta)LB(θ) 使得 Var(u(X~))≥LB(θ),∀θVar(u(\utilde{X}))\ge LB(\theta),\forall \thetaVar(u(X​))≥LB(θ),∀θ，並且存在一個無偏估計 δ∗(X~)\delta^*(\utilde{X})δ∗(X​) 使得 Var(δ∗(X~))=LB(θ)Var(\delta^*(\utilde{X}))=LB(\theta)Var(δ∗(X​))=LB(θ)

Recall that (cov(Y,W))2≤Var(Y)Var(W)  ⟺  Var(W)≥(cov(Y,W))2Var(Y)(cov(Y,W))^2 \le Var(Y)Var(W) \iff Var(W)\ge\frac{(cov(Y,W))^2}{Var(Y)}(cov(Y,W))2≤Var(Y)Var(W)⟺Var(W)≥Var(Y)(cov(Y,W))2​

Take W=u(X~)W=u(\utilde{X})W=u(X​) is unbiased for η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ) and Y=∂∂θlog⁡f(X~;θ)Y=\frac{\partial}{\partial\theta}\log f(\utilde{X};\theta)Y=∂θ∂​logf(X​;θ)

危險

微分和積分並不總是可以交換順序。以上只能在某些情況下成立。

Definition

the Fisher-info

In(θ)=alsoIX~(θ)≜Eθ[(∂∂θlog⁡f(X~;θ))2]I_n(\theta)\xlongequal{also}I_{\utilde{X}}(\theta)\triangleq E_\theta[(\frac{\partial}{\partial\theta}\log f(\utilde{X};\theta))^2]In​(θ)alsoIX​​(θ)≜Eθ​[(∂θ∂​logf(X​;θ))2]

Fisher Information 描述了隨機變量 XXX 中包含有關 θ\thetaθ 的信息量。如果包含的信息量越多，則 f(x;θ)f(x;\theta)f(x;θ) 對於 θ\thetaθ 的變化就越敏感，變化量越大。期望值則消除了隨機性。

Theorem

Cramer-Rao ineq

Let X~∼iidf(x~;θ),θ∈Ω⊆R\utilde{X}\stackrel{\text{iid}}{\sim} f(\utilde{x};\theta), \theta\in\Omega\subseteq\RX​∼iidf(x​;θ),θ∈Ω⊆R

Assume the following conditions hold:

  1. Ω\OmegaΩ is open in R\RR

  2. X={ x~:f(x~;θ)>0 }⊥θX=\set{\utilde{x}:f(\utilde{x};\theta)>0}\perp\thetaX={x​:f(x​;θ)>0}⊥θ

  3. ∂∂θlog⁡f(x~;θ)\frac{\partial}{\partial\theta}\log f(\utilde{x};\theta)∂θ∂​logf(x​;θ) exists ∀x~,θ\forall \utilde{x},\theta∀x​,θ

  4. ∀δ(X~)\forall \delta(\utilde{X})∀δ(X​) with Eθδ(X~)<∞,∀θE_\theta\delta(\utilde{X})<\infty,\forall\thetaEθ​δ(X​)<∞,∀θ

    ∂∂θ∫Rnδ(x~)f(x~;θ)dx~=∫Rnδ(x~)∂∂θf(x~;θ)dx~\frac{\partial}{\partial\theta}\int_{R^n}\delta(\utilde{x})f(\utilde{x};\theta)d\utilde{x}=\int_{R^n}\delta(\utilde{x})\frac{\partial}{\partial\theta}f(\utilde{x};\theta)d\utilde{x}∂θ∂​∫Rn​δ(x​)f(x​;θ)dx​=∫Rn​δ(x​)∂θ∂​f(x​;θ)dx​

  5. In(θ),∀θ,n=1,2,⋯I_n(\theta),\forall\theta,n=1,2,\cdotsIn​(θ),∀θ,n=1,2,⋯ and ∂∂θη(θ)\frac{\partial}{\partial\theta}\eta(\theta)∂θ∂​η(θ) exists

then ∀u(X~)\forall u(\utilde{X})∀u(X​) is unbiased for η(θ)\eta(\theta)η(θ)

Varθ(u(X~))≥(η′(θ))2In(θ)Var_\theta(u(\utilde{X}))\ge\frac{(\eta'(\theta))^2}{I_n(\theta)}Varθ​(u(X​))≥In​(θ)(η′(θ))2​

Remark：

  1. 如果有一個無偏估計 δ∗(X~)\delta^*(\utilde{X})δ∗(X​) 使得 Var(δ∗(X~))=(η′(θ))2In(θ)Var(\delta^*(\utilde{X}))=\frac{(\eta'(\theta))^2}{I_n(\theta)}Var(δ∗(X​))=In​(θ)(η′(θ))2​，則 δ∗(X~)\delta^*(\utilde{X})δ∗(X​) 是 UMVUE，並且我們說 CRLB is attainable。

  2. 如果所有無偏估計的方差都大於 CRLB，則 CRLB is not attainable。
